articles.content:

articles.title: City's doubled investment in pavement quality means more road work than usual in Calgary
articles.description: For commuters in Calgary, it's hard not to notice the road work happening across the city. Paving is set to happen at 320 locations throughout Calgary this year, with 30 road paving projects currently planned, in progress or complete.
articles.content:
